alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Larue; Marion; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 20 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of NORTH CENTRAL and SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, in NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Hardin, Larue and Nelson. In SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Marion. * WHEN...Until 945 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lebanon, New Haven, Loretto, Bradfordsville, Raywick, Saint Francis, Dant, Saint Joseph, Nerinx and Saint Mary. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
